text: waqsm hwla' almushrikun bayman mwkkadt: layin ja'ana muhamad belamt kharqt lnsdqnn bima ja' bh, qul -ayha alrswl-: 'iinama mjy' almejzat alkharqt min eind allah teala, hu alqadir ealaa almaji' biha 'iidha sha', wama ydrykm 'ayuha almwmnwn: lel hadhih almejzat 'iidha ja'at la ysddiq biha hwla' almshrkwn
